posting.title: An Adventure in Time and Space

mission.posting: The new season of Professor What is out, and as a huge fan, your mission is to infiltrate the EBC and procure a copy of the finale script

email.subject: An Adventure in Time and Space
email.body:
#PLAYERNAME#, As a huge fan of the show Professor What, a show about a man who travels with people all around time and space in a suitcase that's bigger on the inside, I feel this mission is more of a personal request. That said, your mission is as follows: Infiltrate the EBC servers and try to find a script for the season 10 finale episode of Professor What. Once you manage to download a copy, upload it to the drop server.
Good luck, -Z3r0
